content.processed:
Rules and recommendations

School dances (e.g. maturitní plesy aka proms) are not allowed to happen in public or in private. Social events of any kind are not allowed, and school dances and other cultural events fall under this rule.

questions_answers.question: Can I have my maturitní ples (school dance) this year?
questions_answers.value: No. Social events of all kinds are not allowed at this time. These regulations are in place until November 20th, but this will quite likely be extended, so we expect no dances will be allowed in 2020.

questions_answers.question: Can we hold a fisherman's ball?

links.title: Train at home and during the next ball season you can be kings and queens of the dance floor:
